Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: JamesB.
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for 2 days now. I cant find anything to complain about. I had just returned from Bogota Colombia where I had left my LG  at Eldorado airport so of to the store I went. Was looking to get another LG  but they were sold out. The guy at the counter knew I travel a lot so he suggested I look at the BLU 5.5S since it has dual sim cards so no need for another phone in Colombia. Well it looked nice and I played around with it for a minute. Very responsive so I went ahead and made the purchase. At this point I am extremely happy with this phone. Kind of makes me wonder why I need to spend another 100 dollars for a phone. This is thing is smooth, no hiccups. Huge screen, mini tablet, great for watching movies on the plane. If youre not a brand name junkie get this phone. I think this company has a bright future.

Reviews.Title: ordred from ebay
Reviews.Author: J. Jones
Reviews.Content: ok, i originally ordered this phone from amazon. something happened with the shipper, but amazon refunded the money. i feel like a traitor cause i then ordered from a diferent person on ebay. same color and model. the blu studio 5.5s ... i love it. I am using a straight talk sim card with at&t; service. picture messages come thru with no problem. my internet speed is 11mbps i can use my hotspot feature with no problem. the phone is huge. it is bigger than a galaxy s3 and s4. i just got the phone today and it looks great. i have a 32gb sd card so i dont have space issues, but the phone itself has 4gb, and after the preinstalled apps its only about 2gb or less. so you will definitely need a good size sd card. i will answer all questions ... they market this phone as 4g, im not in the 4g area, im in the hspa+ area, and its considered 4g because its faster than 3g. it is actually faster than my wifi. sorry for using ebay amazon.

Reviews.Title: Worked Great For First Two Weeks.
Reviews.Author: Eve
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a reliable phone that is fast, with a good camera, and a large screen. This phone is exactly what I was looking for. It is not an LTE phone but I could not tell the difference since it runs using HSDPA (4G) with my carrier and it's just as fast! The screen is very responsive to the touch. I have tried other phones in this price range and usually the screen does not respond the way it does with this phone and the pictures look great.  Some of the reviewers have complained that the memory is only 4gb. Big deal! I purchased a 16gb mini sd card.You may notice that it is a little awkward to put the mini sd card and one reviewer mentioned that they put tape on the piece of metal that sits on top of the sd card. There is no need to do that, the metal is supposed to snap from the front when you input the sd card and when you place the phone cover over it, the sd card will stay in place fine. Keep in mind that you are not purchasing a Samsung Galaxy and don't expect it to perform like a Samsung Galaxy, but you are still getting a great reliable phone at a great price and I couldn't be happier with it.Update on 05/25/2014Everything mentioned above was my experience for the first two weeks of owning this phone, however, on the third week of using the phone, the touch screen became very inconsistent. Some of the keyboard letters have to be pressed a couple of times before getting a response, and at times works in slow motion. I really liked this phone when I purchased it but ended up being a disappointment. I recently returned the phone and originally left 5 stars but I had to edit it to three stars.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for an equally great price. . .
Reviews.Author: Jinx
Reviews.Content: For the last couple of years I have used lower end Android phones. I did extensive research before choosing this phone.  Let me say, this phone puts them and many higher end phones to shame in my opinion. I have had this phone for a month and have had no problem with it. It is fast, responsive, and the phones overall cosmetic design is gorgeous. I often get asked if my Blue is an HTC or a Samsung S3 based on looks alone. I have interacted with both of those phones and I can say that the Blu Studio 5.5S is quite similar to the Samsung S3 (except the my Blu cost significantly less than a S3 bought without a contract).Pros:-The price. When I saw this phone and its specifications I thought it would be at least $350, but I was pleasantly surprised when this phone was roughly half of that.-5.5 inch screen (great for reading and typing emails/documents)-8 megapixel rear camera (with flash) and a 2 megapixel front camera-Android 4.2-Good speaker compared to what I have had in the past-Comes with a phone case and screen protectorCons:-The phone case protects the phone somewhat, but it won't protect against accidental drops like a hard case will-It is hard to find a case other than the one provided that is specifically made for the 5.5S (I solved this by getting a small purse that is just big enough to carry my phone, wallet, keys, etc.)-Nothing about the phone itself.Overall opinion: I would recommend this to anyone who wants a Samsung, but can't afford one. It is sleek and fast. Its expandable memory is great and I really like the overall design of the phone. Although I don't like the case it comes with, it an easy fix if you're creative.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, my wife loved
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: This is my second blue phone they are great,  just wish they come with more memory, and accessories available like cases,  juice pack,  .

Reviews.Title: Awesome size, troubled phone1
Reviews.Author: new mom
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure who has been reviewing this phone but they are so off unless the one I got is really defective.What attracted me to the phone was that the touchscreen was so responsive, no not this one. first off, it was delivered for free one day early(YEAH!). Ok so I'm all happy I got my new phone tried to turn it on, it would not turn on. took out the battery which is very loosely fit btw, turned on the phone without the cover...that worked. then I get to typing, the "C" is not working right...I had to keep going until I got one. downloaded a swpye app. "C" still not working. turned off and on the phone, it played with the idea of working for a while then its working fine. Next day, woke up, had missed calls and messages cant enter password, screen acting up. fouht with it all night...the description said it came with whatsapp, I had to download it. if there was no glitch in the touchscreen issue, it would be a fantastic phone!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Donnie G.
Reviews.Content: Had it for a few days and I am surprised that it is as nice as it is. I like it a lot and didn't think the phone would be as clear as it is. The picture is clear, the camera is clear, the performance is great, and the screen is huge. This phone exceeds my expectations and I would recommend this phone to people.

Reviews.Title: Best unlocked phablet for the money my research could find
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: as good as the Samsung mega at half the price! replaces my iPod, tab 2 7in, and phone.  Using it with Straight  Talk $45 unlimited "Bring Your Own Phone" talk, text & data plan and love it.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement phone
Reviews.Author: bneal69
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a replacement for my broken locked AT&T; phone.  Placed my sim card in and the phone worked immediately.  I have had no issues with the phone up to this point and would recommend this phone to anyone looking to replace a contract AT&T; phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Michael Sims
Reviews.Content: It's a little bigger than I expected, but an awesome phone. Works perfectly. I have not had any problems with lag or freezing. I will definitely be going with this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! It is super fast it has a great camera 8mp, it's easy to use, calls are clear! The screen is huge the same as a Note 3 5.5". So ready to through my iPhone away!!!

Reviews.Title: Good stuff but very fragile
Reviews.Author: Simoni
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my phone and to get a better, bigger screen without breaking my pockect. I certainly did made a right choice. This phone is great and lovely. The screen is very fascinating, very fast and the battery is very long lasting. I only charge once a day. The wifi is also very strong in picking up signals compared to my old phone. The first fault I found was the MMS. Whenever I take pictures - which are lovely - and  try to send it through MMS the phone compressed it a lot. I mean a picture of 15MB was compressed to 33kb. This couldn't allow me to send MMS because people complained they can't see anything. Anyway I checked the MMS to see if there are changes that can be done, unfortunately nothing can be done to reverse that. Second, I shop online looking for a better case for the phone, couldn't find none. The silicon case that came with it, only protect the phone from getting dirty. I was in school studying and placed the phone on the table, and the phone made a slight, I mean slight bang on the table not on the floor; and from there on the issue starts. The issue of rebooting itself. I took out the battery, put it back, free the phone from some running apps, charge it, nothing helps. The crazy part is it will reboot just anytime by itself. I was scared so I had to return it. I've dropped my old phone so many times, on the floor, bed, table without any case and is still working; with a few drama but with not rebooting by itself occasionally. Don't get me wrong the phone is very good if only you are lucky to find case for it because once it make a hard contact on solid stuff that's the end .

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Ronald Bowden
Reviews.Content: I just got my phone and it is really nice to be able to play games and read the new paper/magazines with out going blind with tiny 6 point letters. It is really fast and has everything you need for a phone.  I decided to go with t-mobile and it seems to be working good with them. It comes with a clear plastic cover and screen cover as well..it seems to work well with the cover on..the camera is really nice too.  For the price, it is much better than anything on the market now...

Reviews.Title: amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: alberto
Reviews.Content: very good phone, fast, good look, nice back camera, super flash light. strongly recommend this phone, WiFi work very good

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: juan equeda
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for about 3 weeks an its amazing its bigger than I expected an works great takes awsone pictures an its fast , had lil problems but not major Lol its a great phone I recommended to anybody that wants a big fast cheap unlock phone ,<)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Clarissa king
Reviews.Content: Well I was going to order this phone on Amazon. The bad reviews made me buy it from the store. But this is a great phone and works EVERYWHERE. I love it frfr NOW GET YOU ONE! :)(BIGGER THAN S3 and also comes with a cool charger and headphones

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Mr. A. Kirkpatrick
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone after returning a Moto G which had battery problems. I have been using the phone for a few weeks and have had no real problems with it. The screen is good, with excellent viewing angles. It has dual sim, a replaceable battery, micro SD slot, fast quad core processor and a decent enough amount of ram.  It aslo comes with a silicon case and screen protector. Android Kit Kat is supposedly on the way next month. The only slight issue was that the mains USB charger did not work although this is not a major problem as I use my computer's USB to charge it. All in all I would highly recommended this phone and the customer service is very good should you encounter any issues with your phone. I am quite impressed.

Reviews.Title: Stidio 5.5S
Reviews.Author: DONALD OCEAN
Reviews.Content: Great phone!!! My friend just bought one too and loves it. It is a very good price for such a great phone...

Reviews.Title: Talk about a great affordable phone.
Reviews.Author: Tkay
Reviews.Content: I went to Metro PCS and saw this phone.. It was $499. I wanted the phone so I found it here on Amazon.. I love you Amazon and Thank you CT-Miami LLC. I received my phone on time and fast. It was in tact and was as new as the description said. Excellent phone, great features, love the camera, EVERYTHING.. I love it!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: omega
Reviews.Content: Before I bought this phone, I was the proud owner of a pink BLU Life Play. I wanted a bigger phone (gluttony) and after careful research I picked the Studio 5.5S. However I ended up RETURNING it getting another one and having to return that one too because:1)While I loved the size (perfect for reading and watching movies), the phone even with the provided case on felt slippery. I felt that I could drop it at any time.2) There were no decent cases for the phone.  I searched and looked but to no avail. I love color and I was not going to settle for a rinky dink black TPU case.3) the phone is SLOW. This is what made me just give up on the BLU Studio 5.5S. I use to own the Iphone 4s and galaxy 4 and I am NOT comparing it to those. But the slowness was just too slow. I would start to type in messenger and it would freeze all the time. Websites would not load on my HOME wifi. It was a mess!4) DOES NOT RUN 4G on US ATT and Tmobile.The great thing though is the PRICE. I couldn't deal with the slowness but my mom probably could. Parents this is the phone for your irresponsible teenager.The phone itself is beautiful. I loved the size! Everywhere I went people commented on its 5.5 in screen. I didn't mind it not fitting in my evening clutch because it was a conversation piece. The white color with the silver line oin the botton and black edge give it a sophisticated look comparable to the Samsung Note 3. All in all good price for an okay phone. I would do BLU again just not the Studio 5.5S.

Reviews.Title: Headphones
Reviews.Author: Romello De Jesus
Reviews.Content: Great phone love the camera front camera eh. Speaker is very loud. Problems I had with this phone is I listen to a lot of music but this phone when I connect it to aux cords it plays partially from the phone and car and does the same for some headphones really killed my vibe. But everything else is great my only problem is the aux jack thing and the fact that there aren't cases for this phone

Reviews.Title: What can i say? I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: jonathan
Reviews.Content: being such a new phone i was a bit nervous about buying it but now i have no regrets. the camera is great, the size is great for persons with a larger hand, its key on responsive to every touch and it has some pretty nice features. the phone itself is just great. i received it on time and i have absolutely no regrets. Thanks ALLOT!

Reviews.Title: Blu Studio 5.5
Reviews.Author: James L. Naylor III
Reviews.Content: So far this has been a great phone. I bought it because of the dual sim capability. I use one sim for work and my personal sim for data. It receives call on either phone number.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE!
Reviews.Author: Nichole
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the price definitely. It is everything it said it was and set up was simple. I've read others having problems with putting the mini SD card in the trick is the little metal door slides down then lifts up then you press it down over the SD card and slide it down and it locks into place also people are saying the camera is only 6 mp go to camera settings and take preview mode off of full screen and viola 8mp camera. Hope that's helpful. But really I love this phone it's amazing as far as performance and memory problem is solved with an SD card loving it!

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Lubaba
Reviews.Content: I like this phone since i bought it and save some money. I have no any negative thing to mention just buy and see .

Reviews.Title: Good cheap phone
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: For the price you cannot get anywhere near 5.5" display. The hardware is actually nice, everything runs smooth and you can multitask easily. Phone is constructed well, it's very light and sturdy kind of feels like a Samsung Note3/S4.My only Con that I was well aware of before I bought it was the screen resolution. The screen displays good but the resolution is so low everything is huge and blurry around the edges. I've been spoiled with an HTC ONE (M7) and a Samsung Galaxy S4 before I got this phone. I can really tell a difference between! *This would be a great phone for someone coming over from Apple or a first time Android user.*With all that said, I love the design and I like the phone but this is not a long term answer for me, just a cheap stop gap solution. If you are not worried about the screen this is a great buy and I will suggest it to others. I am a big fan of BLU and will most likely get one of their high end phone soon.

Reviews.Title: just take a chance on it
Reviews.Author: pierre r francois
Reviews.Content: It works fine with T-Mobile but sometimes I can't receive pics. I switch to another phone company ( ultra mobile) now I can't send or receive pics. I did everything like reset APN and other things still don't work. I am switching back to T-Mobile.

Reviews.Title: I HAVE HAD THIS PHONE 3 WEEKS AND IT GIVING ME PROBLEMS ALREADY THE TOUCH SCREEN WILL NOT WORK AT TIMES!
Reviews.Author: kendra
Reviews.Content: BUT YOU PAY FOR WHAT YOU GET IT WAS A CHEAP PHONE AND WORK LIKE A CHEAP PHONE! I WOULDNT BUY FROM THEM AGAIN

Reviews.Title: nice but!
Reviews.Author: Doug akers
Reviews.Content: A nice beginner phone. But cheaply made. Went to put in SIM card and the  slot broke. Disappointing I'm not new st this and its first time that has ever happened.

Reviews.Title: i love it jus needs needs new cases other than the one it comes
Reviews.Author: seabrook
Reviews.Content: I love everything about it no complaint besides the space it was going good till I started getting los bug its still one of the best out here...oh and since its so new I can't find I real good case or screen protector other than the ones it comes with I been searching for 2 months since I had it and still no luck

Reviews.Title: I'm very pleased with my order.
Reviews.Author: PHILLIP V
Reviews.Content: BLU of Miami has always done right by me and it's the 3rd phone I've owned of theirs. Different models each year. They keep improving in the design and quality and responsiveness. I'm very pleased with it. I ordered next day air to ground delivery and it arrived right on time with the UPS service.

Reviews.Title: great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Scott Graham "hightower"
Reviews.Content: Great phone.  I was leary based on the cost.  The manual and website tell you absolutely nothing and the "tech" support for blu service do not seem to answer the phone...(waited 2 hours and finally gave up).  I had a lot of questions when I was researching the phone... such as what kind of sim card does it take found out it takes a regular size (not micro or nano).  I get 4g service.  Phone screen is great...I've watched tv on my phone via slingbox and in hd it looks good.  Ya it's no amoled screen but to most it won't matter.  It takes a micro sd card.. website states up to 64 however I found other sites where people have issues, so I stuck with a 32 bit.  One thing I wasn't too impressed with was bluetooth.  It connects with my car head unit however my pandora used to automatically sync with the stereo and I could see what was playing on the head unit... now only the music comes across.... no big deal.  It always seems to skip as well when first starting any music so I have to pause it... once I do it works fine.  Camera is nice, just remember to take the small piece of plastic off the lense.  Blu keeps saying it will update the os to kitkat.  I'd like that but I'm ok with the current as well.One month update: Still love the phone.  Downloaded a few apps to help save battery and I can get almost a full day of talking, texting and surfing with no issues. App is DU battery saver. It does adjust the timeout and screen brightness but I adjusted it a bit.  The only thing I'm still waiting for is a case. I want a better case to protect the phone than what it came with.  as far as kitkat.... I'm not sure I want to upgrade to it when it comes out because you can't move stuff to the sd card from what i read where as right now I can store most apps on the sd card to keep memory free

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: RJB83
Reviews.Content: phone came with everything you need to start with like a flexiable case that fits the phone a screen protector and headphones. for the price the phone is amazing and it also came unlocked

Reviews.Title: Wrong Advertising- Phone Lack Many Functions
Reviews.Author: Tuan Anh
Reviews.Content: The micro SD slot of this phone only accepts a card up to 32gb as most of the other Blu models, NOT 64gb as advertising.  I am so disappointed when I receive a phone NOT as I expected it based on Amazon advertising.  I felt cheated and could not imagine that Amazon made a seriously wrong statement like that.  I am regret that I have to subtract 2 stars, but I think 3 stars will get more attention.  Please note that these stars have nothing to do with the phone performance.UPDATE: There are several cons on this phone:1- The Android version on this phone lack some functions such as create a folder, user friendly for uninstalling an app... Again, I have to download apps for these functions.2- Don't expect the battery last for long, meaning you have to charge it everyday.  It will not last all day if heavily used! An extra battery costs $25 on eBay.3- Only about 1.8gb internal storage available because Android platform takes more than 2gb, so you certainly need a micro SD card installed.Pros:1- Very nice and sleek design.  It doesn't feel cheap.  I love how it looks.2- It is fast.3- I expect the phone will last very long, but time will tell.In the early update I thought there was no zoom option for the camera, but actually I was wrong.  I appologize for that mistake.  Use 2 fingers to spread out or close in for zooming in or out.

Reviews.Title: A good cell phone but a bit disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Dukens Floreal "Duke"
Reviews.Content: I bough this cellphone and I have to admit, it's a really good phone; according to the benchmark test, it got 17217, which is comparable to the Samsung Galaxy S3 . The responsiveness, the touch screen is really fast and accurate.My problem now is the camera, it says 8 MP, there is only 3 options, 1 MP, 4 MP and 6 MP. With 6 MP. In video, there is no way to switch from 1080p to 720p, 480p or VGA.When using another language (eg. Spanish), the Setting Menu in camera is overwritten, it looks horrible.The cellphone is Dual SIM and they didn't mention that on the description. I didn't want dual SIM phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Anabelle
Reviews.Content: Excellent cellphone, it have more or less the specifications of a galaxy note 2. I love it and I will recomend this brand (BLU) to other persons. Love the screen that it 5.5", is quadcore, good processor. I live in Puerto Rico and I use TMobile and it runs very good here.The only thing that I change of the cell is the pixels of the camera. The camera is 8 megapixels so I would it upgraded it to at least 12 megapixels.

Reviews.Title: Great phone but a few minor problems
Reviews.Author: Mourama
Reviews.Content: The only bad thing about this phone, are the headphones. Only the headphones that came with the phone work on the phone, and to use the radio app you must have these headphones in. This isn't a big deal because the phone itself is great, but once the headphones the phone came with break I'm not really sure what they expect you to dodl. Great phone, I am a little upset that when I bought it, it was 198 and two week later they dropped the price $20 on amazon but I guess that's just the way the cookie crumbles.

Reviews.Title: Memory Card Issue
Reviews.Author: Emery McClendon Sr
Reviews.Content: Overall the phone is great.  The one issue that I have is how to install the MICRO SD CARD into its slot.  Does anyone know why it won't go in straight?  Also the phone won't do WIFI calling.  In some I locations that is an issue due to reception.

Reviews.Title: Ok Until....
Reviews.Author: Mike Frost
Reviews.Content: Everything works on the phone except the SD card will not show up in it. Everything else is ok, and I am using the Metro Service on it, in which, will have nothing to do with the hardware. I am disappointed that the SD card slot does not work cause that defeats a lot of the phones purposes.

Reviews.Title: Replacement battery needed urgently.
Reviews.Author: Vincent N.
Reviews.Content: Hard to get replacement battery. How can I get a replacement battery? Urgent please!!!!!!!! Tell me where I can get the battery for BLU 5.5 S D630u

Reviews.Title: Blu Studio 5.5S is OK
Reviews.Author: Jean Goodwin
Reviews.Content: I bought the Blu Studio 5.5S from net10 online.  It has a 6 Megapixel camera, Not 8, as advertised everywhere.  I can find no decent documentation.  I used a pin to lock, and find I have been unable to reverse this.  Drops calls frequently, so I am back to my 4 year old lg800 that works perfectly as  phone.**************UPDATE*******************I am wrong about Camera it is * mega pixel.  When you go to Camera settings and switch from Preview mode the camera will go from 6 o 8 Mega pixel.  Also I found pin lock unlock is under root settings by putting in pin under security it can be turned off.  So I am Liking Blu More now.  I will give it 4 stars with the dropped call problem under net10 at 3G.  Other carriers and other areas then Boston may do better.Anyway I am actually liking Blu and they did respond via e-mail where there Phone support is almost impossible to get through on.  Aside from that people say the quality of transmission while talking is great.  Maybe I will try one of the cheaper Blu's as a phone backup.So 4 STARS for me.. Sorry.

Reviews.Title: poor design non functioning phone
Reviews.Author: zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
Reviews.Content: they use a little trap door to hold down the micro sdxs 64gb card.... hinged worked twice but after that no longer latches... just sliding it in place wasn't good enough i guess so they came up with this idiotic design....  64gb cards will NOT mount, i've tried three different cards and it ALWAYS reports that the card is damaged even when the card works perfectly well in other devices.... a 32gb card works if you scotch tape down the little door but no 64gb card has worked....  very difficult company to talk to and they have not responded at all to my queries regarding this phone...  VERY BAD PHONE and i am returning it to Amazon today....  STAY AWAY FROM THIS DOG!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not working as i would think it should
Reviews.Author: Johnson N.
Reviews.Content: trying using it with sims card local carriers ( one LTE 4 G , the other AWS  carrier), it did not work as i thought it should, only one sim is card active or working properly

ProductInfo.Features:
5.5 inch IPS Display: QHD (540x960)8MP Camera with LED Flash with HD recording (1080p), 2MP Front Camera
4GB Internal Storage with Micro SD Slot up to 64GB
4G HSPA+ up to 21 Mbps 850/1700/1900
1.3 GHz Quad Core Processor Android 4.2 Jelly Bean
3.5mm Audio Jack, FM Radio, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
The Studio 5.5 S bundles a premium design, affordability and simplicity all in one incredible package. This user friendly smartphone runs on Android V4.2 Jellybean, featuring a 5.5?? display, Quad Core 1.3 GHz processor and 8MP camera. Stay in touch via Facebook, Whatsapp, and more!
ProductInfo.Name: Studio 5.5S Quad Band Unlocked (White)
